jedi:cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
jedi:cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
jedi:cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:forcepull.NAME: Force Pull
jedi:forcepull.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

jedi:forcepush.NAME: Force Push
jedi:forcepush.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw a card.

jedi:BurstLightning.NAME: Burst Lightning
jedi:BurstLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales with Focus instead of Strength. NL Is affected by Electrodynamics.
jedi:BurstLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales !M! times with Focus instead of Strength. NL Is affected by Electrodynamics.

jedi:BurstFrost.NAME: Burst Frost
jedi:BurstFrost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales with Focus instead of Dexterity.
jedi:BurstFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales !M! times with Focus instead of Dexterity.

jedi:BurstDark.NAME: Burst Dark
jedi:BurstDark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, increase damage of this card by your Focus. NL Exhaust.

jedi:hex.NAME: Hex
jedi:hex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

jedi:sharpshooter.NAME: Sharpshooter
jedi:sharpshooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

jedi:readyaimfire.NAME: Ready, Aim, Fire
jedi:readyaimfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Evoke ALL orbs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:reiji.NAME: Reiji
jedi:reiji.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
jedi:reiji.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply 3 Lock-On. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

jedi:blockon.NAME: Block-On
jedi:blockon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Lock-On to all enemies that intend to attack you.

jedi:gatheringstorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
jedi:gatheringstorm.DESCRIPTION: For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning. NL Exhaust.

jedi:meditation.NAME: Meditation
jedi:meditation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus every turn. NL Lose ALL Focus whenever you lose HP.

jedi:darknesscall.NAME: Darkness Call
jedi:darknesscall.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have Dark Orb Channeled. NL Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP. NL Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb. NL Exhaust.

jedi:frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
jedi:frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, lose 3 Strength this turn.

jedi:strikingstrike.NAME: Strikeing Strike
jedi:strikingstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.
jedi:strikingstrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random upgraded Strike on the same enemy. NL Exhaust.

jedi:onestrike.NAME: One Strike
jedi:onestrike.DESCRIPTION: Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Fleeting.
jedi:onestrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Realize you wasted an [#FFFFFF]upgrade[]. NL Fleeting.

jedi:hate.NAME: Hate
jedi:hate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Anger in your discard pile. NL Exhaust ALL Angers in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
jedi:hate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Anger in your discard pile. NL Exhaust ALL Angers in your discard pile.

jedi:fear.NAME: Fear
jedi:fear.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Angers to your hand. NL Exhaust.
jedi:fear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! upgraded Angers to your hand. NL Exhaust.

jedi:suffering.NAME: Suffering
jedi:suffering.DESCRIPTION: For each Attack Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

jedi:harder.NAME: Harder
jedi:harder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Add Better to your hand.
jedi:harder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Metallicize. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Add Make it Better to your hand.

jedi:better.NAME: Better
jedi:better.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards in hand. NL Add Faster to your hand. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
jedi:better.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards in hand. NL This turn, upgrade ALL cards drawn. NL Add Do it Faster to your hand. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

jedi:faster.NAME: Faster
jedi:faster.DESCRIPTION: Apply Slow to an enemy. NL Add Stronger to your hand. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
jedi:faster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] [E] NL Apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Add Makes us Stronger to your hand. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.

jedi:stronger.NAME: Stronger
jedi:stronger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength every turn. NL Ethereal.
jedi:stronger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength every turn. NL Ethereal.

jedi:unlimitedpower.NAME: Unlimited Power
jedi:unlimitedpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Unlimited.
jedi:unlimitedpower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust. NL Unlimited.

jedi:test.NAME: Test
jedi:test.DESCRIPTION: If you're reading this, you're either me or something went wrong.
jedi:test.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: That or you're very curious on github.

jedi:bruteforce.NAME: Bruteforce
jedi:bruteforce.DESCRIPTION: Can only be used if you have Lightning Channeled. NL Evoke your rightmost Lightning Orb till it hits selected enemy !M! times.

jedi:bloodyhammer.NAME: Bloody Hammer
jedi:bloodyhammer.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Permanently upgrade a card in your hand. NL Purge.
jedi:bloodyhammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Permanently upgrade a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

jedi:controlledanger.NAME: Controlled Anger
jedi:controlledanger.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Angers to your hand. NL Whenever you play an Anger, Exhaust it.
jedi:controlledanger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Angers to your hand. NL Whenever you play an Anger, Exhaust it.
